TopicTitle: Icons for Action Group Manager are Wrong

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: NA | CPU: NA | GPU: NA | RAM: NA

 

Icon for part groups in the action group manager all show the command pod icon, instead of their actual respective icon.

This was an issue for the parts manager, but it was fixed in patch 4, so it seems like the action group manager got forgotten lol.

Similarly, opening the action group manager (and resource manager in flight) still exhibit the huge lag spike when opening them that was fixed for the parts manager. 
 

Seems like these are all issues that were already solved for the parts manager, but the fixes were never transferred to the other similar systems.
